name: app.R
content:
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

plot_norm = function(mean = 5, sd = 1, type = "p") {
  qn = qnorm(p = c(0.01, 0.99), mean = mean, sd = sd)
  x = seq(qn[1], qn[2], length.out = 1000)
  if(type == "p") {
    data = data.frame(x,
                      y = pnorm(x, mean = mean, sd = sd))  
  } else {
    data = data.frame(x,
                      y = dnorm(x, mean = mean, sd = sd))  
  }
  
  ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_line() +
    theme_bw()
}

ui = fluidPage(
  title = "Normalverteilung",
  sidebarPanel(
    sliderInput(
      inputId = "mean",
      label = "Erwartungswert:",
      min = -50,
      max = 50,
      value = 0,
      step = 1
    ),
    sliderInput(
      inputId = "sd",
      label = "Standardabweichung:",
      min = 0.1,
      max = 10,
      value = 1,
      step = 0.1
    ),
    radioButtons(
      inputId = "type",
      label = "Typ:",
      choices = c("Verteilung" = "p",
                  "Dichte" = "d")
    )
  ),
  mainPanel(
    plotOutput(outputId = "norm")  
  )
)

server = function(input, output) {
  output$norm = renderPlot(
    plot_norm(mean = input$mean, sd = input$sd, type = input$type)
  )
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
